definitions.definition: A gesture or posture of cringing ( recoiling or shrinking ).
examples: He glanced with a cringe at the mess on his desk.

definitions.definition: An act or disposition of servile obeisance .
A crick ( “ painful muscular cramp or spasm of some part of the body ” ) .
Things, particularly online content , which would cause an onlooker to cringe from secondhand embarrassment .
examples: There was so much cringe in that episode!

main_definition: ( countable ) A gesture or posture of cringing ( recoiling or shrinking ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable , figuratively ) An act or disposition of servile obeisance .
( countable , British , dialectal ) A crick ( “ painful muscular cramp or spasm of some part of the body ” ) .
( uncountable , slang , derogatory ) Things, particularly online content , which would cause an onlooker to cringe from secondhand embarrassment .
